name: Prestidigitation
description: You create a magical effect within range. Choose the effect from the options below. If you cast this spell multiple times, you can have up to three of its non-instantaneous effects active at a time.

spellOptions.name: Sensory Effect
spellOptions.description: You create an instantaneous, harmless sensory effect, such as a shower of sparks, a puff of wind, faint musical notes, or an odd odor.

spellOptions.name: Fire Play
spellOptions.description: You instantaneously light or snuff out a candle, a torch, or a small campfire.

spellOptions.name: Clean or Soil
spellOptions.description: You instantaneously clean or soil an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.

spellOptions.name: Minor Sensation
spellOptions.description: You chill, warm, or flavor up to 1 cubic foot of nonliving material for 1 hour.

spellOptions.name: Magic Mark
spellOptions.description: You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.

spellOptions.name: Minor Creation
spellOptions.description: You create a nonmagical trinket or an illusory image that can fit in your hand. It lasts until the end of your next turn. A trinket can deal no damage and has no monetary worth.
